articles.author: Avery Lotz
articles.title: How Trump could use the Insurrection Act to send troops to American cities - Axios
articles.description: The president told reporters Monday that "we have an Insurrection Act for a reason."
articles.content:
• A president hasn't invoked the Insurrection Act in decades.
Driving the news: Trump said Monday in the Oval Office he hasn't needed to use the Insurrection Act "so far." But, he adde… [+4181 chars]
